info.author: Gheorghe Milas
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: Python Software Foundation License
info.description:
- A web framework/API with easy database access using an ORM and with a free generated admin site for editing 
        the database content.
      - Code may be moved from IIS/ASP to Apache/ModPython/PSP without almost no modifications.
      - The ORM can be used outside of the framework, supports natural and composite keys and imposes no restrictions on the database. 
        The mapping can be built automaticaly using a full database inspection including foreign keys constraints
info.name: PWH
info.summary: Web framework for code to be moved between ASP/PSP with an integrated database ORM
info.html_description:
- A web framework/API with easy database access using an ORM and with a free generated admin site for editing
the database content.
- Code may be moved from IIS/ASP to Apache/ModPython/PSP without almost no modifications.
- The ORM can be used outside of the framework, supports natural and composite keys and imposes no restrictions on the database.
The mapping can be built automaticaly using a full database inspection including foreign keys constraints
